description: A genius that ditches class frequently throughout the story. Hated and feared by a lot of students, he is thoroughly unhappy with the school, and is suspicious of the intentions of adults. It seems that he is involved in top-secret missions for the Academy. He is paired up as Mikan`s "partner" by the their mostly-absent class teacher, Narumi. However, Natsume is later forced to partner with Luna. He possesses the Alice of Fire. He has a secret crush on Mikan and gets jealous whenever Narumi, Tsubasa, Kaname, and Tono or any other guys tries to flirt with her. Natsume loves Mikan so much that he would sacrifice himself for her
name: Hyuuga Natsume
